## Using a Remote Release

A remote release can be used for long time-exposures. When using an optional RR-100 remote release or an electronic release from third-party suppliers, connect it to the camera’s microphone/remote release connector via a third-party adapter that converts the female three-pin, ø2.5 mm connector to a male three-pin, ø3.5 mm connector.

!Remote Release Connection

A confirmation dialog will be displayed when a remote release is connected; press **MENU/OK** and select !Remote Icon **REMOTE** for **MIC/REMOTE RELEASE**.

!Check Mic/Remote Release Setting
